query: Gravel One Fifty gravel race Roden

videos.title: My First Gravel Race | Gravel One Fifty
videos.description:
Welcome to the first episode of the thrilling UCI gravel series! Join a passionate novice cyclist as he takes on his first-ever UCI gravel race, the Gravel One Fifty, in the Netherlands. From a challenging start at the back to pushing for ambitious goals, witness the highs and lows of this adrenaline-fueled adventure.

Explore stunning farmlands and experience the camaraderie among riders as they navigate tough terrains and unexpected turns. Witness strategic alliances and daring moves to close gaps, all while chasing the dream of qualifying for the UCI Gravel World Championships.

But, just when victory seems within reach, a dramatic move in the final stretch adds a twist to the tale. Embrace the spirit of resilience as our rider continues to ride on, showcasing the essence of the gravel racing community.

Whether you're a seasoned gravel racer or a cycling enthusiast seeking excitement, this video delivers unforgettable moments and surprises from the world of gravel races. Subscribe now for more exhilarating episodes to come!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
As I don't have any sponsors yet, I would like to dedicate this video to a buddy of mine who is running from Amsterdam to Kyiv at the moment. In 50 days he will run 2500 K's in order to raise money and build Ambulances for Ukraine. Your support at ultra4ukraine.com would mean the world to us.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Feel free to follow me on Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/flyinggravelman
Contact: HesTech.FGM@gmail.com

Video chapters
0:00 Intro
1:09 Start of race
6:52 Closing the gaps
23:00 Farm
23:47 Exciting Finale
26:30 Crash
28:29 Stats + Outro

videos.title: Gravel Onefifty - UCI Gravel Qualifier (2025)
videos.description:
Again a large and strong starting field. Early present so was further ahead than usual. The first kilometers went very fast while it moved fairly quickly on unpaved paths.

The first 15km well from the front and drove very fast with an average speed of almost 40km/h despite the narrow bridge at km 7.5. Then I was in the second group a little less hard but still hard! Up to +- km 40 it went great (36+ km/h average) and was still nice and far ahead. Unfortunately, at this point there was a wasp flying into my helmet that I couldn't get out quickly and also stung me.

At the first feeding stop at km 70 but stopped for a while because I soon got a fierce sting and a burning sensation. I was getting more and more dizzy. Cool down and stop your legs and then try to continue on the road. Direct gas on it because had a nice group for this. Drove back but the tank hit army and army.

The best was from after km 110. Still by fighting another bottle filled at the last feeding post because despite my camelback and water bottles icm the heat too little moisture... I came to sit alone but still drove back a bit after the group. Pressed out another sprint and crossed the line after 4h 39m 18s.

#inmyelemnt #instacyclingcommunity #lifebehindbars #iamsiroko #orbea #pov #rideinstyle #ridewithme #ucigravelworldseries #qualifier #gravelonefifty

videos.title: De meest MISERABELE omstandigheden in een gravelkoers! - de Gravel onefifty
videos.description:
Terug naar Juli voor de meest bizarre wedstrijd die ik ooit heb gefietst. Ja? Ja ik denk het wel eigenlijk. Een moddercross van bijna 5 uur. De schrik van elke gravelbike. Een ware hel. Maar ook weer niet. Ik ga All-in om die kwalificatie binnen te halen.

videos.title: Gravel onefifty race vlog - tried to qualify for the gravel world champs
videos.description:
I went to the Nederlands to race UCI Gravel Onefifty. Going in to the race I had to goals. Firstly to find out what the level is in these big gravel races and second to try to qualify for the gravel world championship. 
In this video I take you along for the ride. 
The gravel onefifty is one of the UCI gravel races where the top 25% of each age group get a spot at the gravel world championship. 
The gravel onefifty race is located in the Nederland and is completly flat. Instead of climbing the route had allmost every kind of gravel and many technical part

00:00 - 01:22 Intro to gravel one fifty
01:23 - 03:32 Part 1 of the gravel race
03:33 - 05:35 Part 2 of the race "the hunt"
05:36 - 09:44 Part 3 finishing gravel one fifty 
09:45 - 13:02 did i qualify and what I learned 

The gravel onefifty is a UCI gravel race of 150 km. The route offers every kind of gravel you can imagine and many technical part. If you finish within the top 25% of your age group you get a chance to qualify for the UCI gravel world championship. 


#gravel #gravelracing #gravelrace #gravelbike

videos.title: UCI Gravel World Cup Roden | Race Vlog
videos.description:
In this vlog I take you with me to The Gravel One Fifthy NL. I show the preperations, the travel and the race. Hope you enjoy! #rideshimano 

I'm Femke, a 19yr cyclist from the Netherlands. I enjoy riding my bike and capturing my journey. 

If anybody has tips or questions, do not hesitate 🙂. 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/femke_gort/

Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/9256975

Photography Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/soulisation/



Twitter: https://twitter.com/femke_gort



LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/femkegort.
